hierophant:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
hierophant:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

hierophant:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
hierophant:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
hierophant:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

hierophant:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
hierophant:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

hierophant:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
hierophant:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !hierophant:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

hierophant:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
hierophant:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !hierophant:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

hierophant:Blessing.NAME: Blessing
hierophant:Blessing.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M!. NL Heal ALL enemies !M!. NL Exhaust.

hierophant:Doubloon.NAME: Doubloon
hierophant:Doubloon.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust. NL hierophant:Hoard !M!.

hierophant:DivineIntervention.NAME: Divine intervention
hierophant:DivineIntervention.DESCRIPTION: Fully heal an enemy. NL Gain !M! hierophant:Piety per HP healed.

hierophant:Smite.NAME: Smite
hierophant:Smite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals 1 additional damage per !M! piety.

hierophant:ConvertCurrency.NAME: Convert Currency
hierophant:ConvertCurrency.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Energy for each Doubloon in your hand. NL Discard all Doubloons. NL hierophant:Gilded
hierophant:ConvertCurrency.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Energy for each Doubloon in your hand. NL hierophant:Gilded

hierophant:RecallFunds.NAME: Recall Funds
hierophant:RecallFunds.DESCRIPTION: Return up to !M! Doubloons from your exhaust pile to your hand. NL Exhaust. NL hierophant:Gilded.

hierophant:Dazzle.NAME: Dazzle
hierophant:Dazzle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Gain !M! block for each doubloon in your hand. NL hierophant:Gilded.

hierophant:Borrow.NAME: Borrow
hierophant:Borrow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gold. NL At the end of the turn, return any of the !M! gold you did not spend.

hierophant:Entourage.NAME: Entourage
hierophant:Entourage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Gain 1 additional block per !M! gold spent this turn. NL hierophant:Tithe.

hierophant:Shelter.NAME: Shelter
hierophant:Shelter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL ALL enemies gain !B! block.

hierophant:MirrorShield.NAME: Mirror Shield
hierophant:MirrorShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain block equal to an enemy's block.
hierophant:MirrorShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain block equal to an enemy's block. NL Draw a card.

hierophant:ChurchCoffers.NAME: ChurchCoffers
hierophant:ChurchCoffers.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL gain !M! energy. NL hierophant:Tithe.

hierophant:Sermon.NAME: Sermon
hierophant:Sermon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! hierophant:Piety. NL Gain !M! additional hierophant:Piety per unique active hierophant:Vow.

hierophant:Miracle.NAME: Miracle
hierophant:Miracle.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL status cards in your hand. NL Gain !M! piety per card exhausted.

hierophant:Bribe.NAME: Bribe
hierophant:Bribe.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL hierophant:Tithe.

hierophant:Flagellation.NAME: Flagellation
hierophant:Flagellation.DESCRIPTION: Add 2 Wounds to your hand. NL Gain !M! hierophant:Piety.

hierophant:PristineSoul.NAME: Pristine Soul
hierophant:PristineSoul.DESCRIPTION: Set your block and hierophant:Piety to the highest of their two values.

hierophant:Prophecy.NAME: Prophecy
hierophant:Prophecy.DESCRIPTION: Put the highest cost card from your draw pile into your hand.
hierophant:Prophecy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put the highest cost card from your draw and discard piles into your hand.

hierophant:Doomsaying.NAME: Doomsaying
hierophant:Doomsaying.DESCRIPTION: Discard the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Gain energy equal to the highest cost among the discarded cards.

hierophant:Divination.NAME: Divination
hierophant:Divination.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL If its cost is the highest among cards in your hand, repeat the process.

hierophant:Prayer.NAME: Prayer
hierophant:Prayer.DESCRIPTION: Play the highest cost card among the top X cards of your draw pile.
hierophant:Prayer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play the highest cost card among the top X+1 cards of your draw pile.

hierophant:Repentance.NAME: Repentance
hierophant:Repentance.DESCRIPTION: Gain hierophant:Piety equal to twice the hierophant:Piety lost this combat. NL Exhaust
hierophant:Repentance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain hierophant:Piety equal to twice the hierophant:Piety lost this combat.

hierophant:Repentance.NAME: Repentance
hierophant:Repentance.DESCRIPTION: Gain hierophant:Piety equal to twice the hierophant:Piety lost this combat. NL Exhaust
hierophant:Repentance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain hierophant:Piety equal to twice the hierophant:Piety lost this combat.

hierophant:Contemplation.NAME: Contemplation
hierophant:Contemplation.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of your turn, put 2 unplayable Meditation status cards in your draw pile, then draw !M! cards.

hierophant:VowOfPoverty.NAME: Vow Of Poverty
hierophant:VowOfPoverty.DESCRIPTION: You may not earn gold this combat. NL Gain 1 strength at the beginning of your turn.
hierophant:VowOfPoverty.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You may not gain gold this combat. NL Gain 1 strength at the beginning of your turn. NL Innate.

hierophant:VowOfSobriety.NAME: Vow Of Sobriety
hierophant:VowOfSobriety.DESCRIPTION: You may not consume or earn potions this combat. NL Gain 1 dexterity at the beginning of your turn.
hierophant:VowOfSobriety.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You may not consume or earn potions this combat. NL Gain 1 dexterity at the beginning of your turn. NL Innate.

hierophant:VowOfSobriety.NAME: Vow Of Sobriety
hierophant:VowOfSobriety.DESCRIPTION: You may not consume or earn potions this combat. NL Gain 1 dexterity at the beginning of your turn.
hierophant:VowOfSobriety.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You may not consume or earn potions this combat. NL Gain 1 dexterity at the beginning of your turn. NL Innate.

hierophant:VowOfSanctity.NAME: Vow Of Sanctity
hierophant:VowOfSanctity.DESCRIPTION: You lose 3 additional piety when dealing damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain 10 piety.
hierophant:VowOfSanctity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You lose 3 additional piety when dealing damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain 10 piety. NL Innate.

hierophant:VowOfStability.NAME: Vow Of Stability
hierophant:VowOfStability.DESCRIPTION: You take double unblocked attack damage. NL At the end of your turn, double your block.
hierophant:VowOfStability.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You take double unblocked attack damage. NL At the end of your turn, double your block. NL Innate.
